description:
A new adaptation of the Mahoujin Guru Guru manga.

The seal that for hundreds of years had confined the demon king Giri has worn off. A young boy named Nike is chosen (against his will) as the hero. Together with Kukuri, a girl who is the lone survivor of the tribe that had used black magic to seal Giri, they set off to save the world, RPG style.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

title.native: グルグルぷちあにめ劇場

node.description: Praised nationwide for his work as a character designer on [Osomatsu-san](https://anilist.co/anime/21261/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/huusun)

Originating from Xebec. Although now is freelancer, currently engaged in training young directors for [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/) as of May 2024. Debuted as a director on [Wonder Egg Priority](https://anilist.co/anime/124845/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/god_valley_to2)

Tomomi Kamiya is an animator and director.

Kouji Komurakata is a director, storyboard artist, and animator formerly affiliated with [Ajiado](https://anilist.co/studio/30/Ajiado). He currently heads Animation Department of [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/Production-IG) Studio Niigata.
Yonebayashi Taku (米林拓) is a Japanese production manager, storyboard artist and episode director.
